page.title: 04Ian Smallridge's Day
page.content: I get up at 7.15 and go downstairs to have my breakfast. I have Frosties and sometimes bacon. Then I go back upstairs to get dressed and make my bed. I then watch breakfast TV until we take my dad to work at Faygate Garage where he works from 8.00 to 5.30pm. At 8.20 we leave home and get to school at 8.30. When we get in we read for thirty minutes. After maths we have an assembly. After a 20 minutes playtime we have english and science until lunch. After lunch we have art and we do all sorts of things like painting, clay and drawings. Then we have a radio programme called "In the News". When I go home I watch childrens' programmes on ITV. Then we go to our Nan's. At 9.00 we go to bed.
